I looked at the torrent file, and both the torrent filename and the filenames in the torrent are full of Japanese characters.  Is this a Japanese language version or embedded with Japanese subtitles or something?  If so, WHY is that not mentioned in the description, and if not then WHY all the Japanese in the filenames???
